resources.string: Green is said to be the most neutral color.
Black is the absence of color and is therefore not a color.
White is the blending of all colors.
Red is thought to be the sign of anger, love, power.
Blue can give the feelings of harmony, peace and caring.
Pink is a pale red color that is named after a flower of the same name.
The first recorded use of brown as a color name in English was in 1000.
Violet is the color at the end of the visible spectrum of light between blue and the invisible ultraviolet.
In Ukraine in Novemberâ€“December 2004, it became the colour of the Orange Revolution.
Purple is the color most often associated with rareness, royalty, magic, mystery, and piety.
It is a neutral or achromatic color, meaning literally that it is a color \"without color\".
Because it was widely available, yellow ochre pigment was one of the first colors used in art.
